programme.title: En Mis Propias Manos
programme.desc: The wife of a police officer is molested, beaten and mentally and physically abused. Other police officers suspect that something is happening, but the woman is afraid to speak up and accuse her abuser.

programme.title: El Comandante Antrax
programme.desc: Commander Anthrax is the armed wing of the Cartel. He is in charge of protecting the place. When a band of kaibiles arrive in the city to try to take over the area, they begin to kill the boss's main associates and force his hand.

programme.title: Brillando En La Oscuridad
programme.desc: Two men, one mourning the murder of his child and the other the aftermath of being cheated by his wife, travel to Jacomulco to find inner peace. On the road, they find several unique characters.

programme.title: Devil's Witness
programme.desc: The Italian vacation of two college girls clashes with an ancient ritual. But sometimes the pray become hunters.

programme.title: Sanitarium
programme.desc: Dylan goes with Mike to record his last bet, but instead they discover a twisted murderer. Their night becomes a living nightmare.

programme.title: 2: Voodoo Academy
programme.desc: Young hot travelers are sidelined by a road blocked with fallen trees, and stop for a night at the mansion belonging to sexy Sebastian. The house has a history of voodoo, mayhem and horror, and new arrivals are fresh meat for the hungry house.

programme.title: Live Escape
programme.desc: Two cops investigate an eerie empty homeless shelter with an endless maze of spaces and are attacked by zombies. They discover how these zombies were created. What will happen if zombies escape into the city?

programme.title: Ovnis En Zacapa
programme.desc: Robert Daneri, a frustrated college professor, travels with a sensationalist TV show crew to Zacapa, northwestern Guatemala, where they’ll have to uncover the truth behind a series of UFO sighting that had supposedly occurred in the area.

programme.title: Cara A Cara
programme.desc: While still a college student, Laura is abused by members of her boyfriend Andrés’ organization. Now, she had became a jewelry smuggler who is ready to seek revenge of those that wrong her before.

programme.title: La Corte Malandra
programme.desc: Jose Thomas tells his story, when he was a gangster who defended his hood, helped his neighbours, and talked kids out of being like him. Jose Thomas is a spirit, is one of the entities that became part of La Corte Malandra cult.

programme.title: Azotes De Barrio
programme.desc: Donay is a young man serving the last leg of his sentence in prison. He meets Alicia and the boy starts to dream a different future for him. But as soon as he leaves prison, the Azotes de Barrio, the gang of his slum, will intervene to pushing him back into the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Texas Huele A Sangre
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff wants to bring order to his county, but he is faced with a violent drug dealer who tries to enforce his law at all costs, unleashing an impressive wave of violence and blood.

programme.title: Los Pistoleros
programme.desc: In search of money, women and fame, a group of friends enter the world of the mafia as hired guns.

programme.title: El Gavilan Justiciero
programme.desc: Two families become intertwined in the bloodiest fight ever seen, where greed and ambition bring suffering to one family and the envy of the other.
